Title: Episode 1
Plot: The government introduces draconian emergency measures in response to a series of terrorist attacks. MI5 fear that influential establishment figures are behind the attacks and may be planning a coup.
GuestStars: Roger Ringrose,  Steve Nicolson,  Alan McKenna,  Roger Allam,  John Castle,  Simon Woods,  Lindsay Duncan,  Nicholas Jones,  Robert Glenister,  James Cash,  Anita McVeigh,  David Phelan,  Helen Anderson,  Grant P
